title: MeteoEarth Version 1.1 Build 65792 Apk ~CM~
description:
MeteoEarth Version 1.1 Build 65792 Apk

Description

*** As seen on TV! MeteoEarth is the revolutionary new weather app from MeteoGroup, the developers of WeatherPro. ***

Adapted from a professional weather broadcast tool used by TV presenters around the world, and employing high-end gaming technology, never before used in a weather app, the stunning graphics on MeteoEarth bring the weather to life.

Navigate the 3D globe at the touch of a button, spin seamlessly from place to place, zoom in on a rain front moving over Europe then pan out to see a hurricane approaching Florida.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Worldwide weather: watch weather events as they unfold around the globe.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Visually impactful: amaze and impress with stunning high resolution graphics.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ User friendly: zoom in and out and spin around the globe seamlessly with smooth movement and instantaneous navigation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Interactive: pause the real time animation to highlight weather phenomena and move back and forth at will.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fully customisable: choose elements to display including cloud cover, wind streams and rain. Switch between the 3D globe and a flattened map

You donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t need to be a weather enthusiast to love MeteoEarth. Adapted from a professional weather broadcast tool, the awesome design and smooth movement means itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s simply a pleasure to show-off with this app.

Overlay weather graphics to show:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Temperature: Locate warm and cold areas around the world. Ã¢â‚¬â€œ NEW! You can now choose to show the air temperature over the land and/or over the sea (2m above water level).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Precipitation: See the rain front coming in.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cloud cover: Follow the direction of the low, middle and high moving clouds. Ã¢â‚¬â€œ NEW! WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve made wonderful improvements to the clouds layer - you can now choose to look at the cloud cover at different heights (high, middle or low) and our enhanced graphics mean they look incredibly realistic.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wind: Check the wind conditions with this animated feature. Ã¢â‚¬â€œ NEW! You can now select the altitude right up to the jetstream (Premium)!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pressure: Add isobars to track high and low pressure systems.

Additional features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NEW! Multiple elements can be viewed at once - simply tap on the icons to add the elements you wish to see (Premium).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optional full screen mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Local time zone clocks for favourite locations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Daylight / darkness realistically represented around the globe
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Moon phases
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optional country borders
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search over 2m locations worldwide and show the latest weather observation data
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NEW! Connect directly to your chosen location in WeatherPro for a detailed forecast

1 day or 5 day forecast:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MeteoEarth displays a forecast for the day ahead for all of the listed weather elements.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ For a 5 day forecast, simply subscribe to our Premium service. You only need to purchase one Premium subscription and you will be able to use the Premium services on MeteoEarth and WeatherPro!

For status updates please follow MeteoEarth ator visit www.MeteoEarth.com for further detail.
